00032 
00033         // input:
00034         inline bool KeyDown(unsigned char chKey) { return m_bKeys[chKey]; }
00035         inline bool KeyUp(unsigned char chKey)   { return !m_bKeys[chKey]; }
00036         inline void SetKey(unsigned char chKey, bool bState) { m_bKeys[chKey] = bState; } 
00037         inline int  GetMouseX()                  { return m_iMouseX; }
00038         inline int  GetMouseY()                  { return m_iMouseY; }
00039         inline bool MouseBtnDown(WORD wBtn)      { return (m_iMouseBtn & wBtn ? true : false ); }
00040         inline bool MouseBtnUp(WORD wBtn)        { return (m_iMouseBtn & wBtn ? false : true ); }
00041 
00042         inline bool IsActive()                   { return m_bActive; }
